weap id [weapon]: 328 (Shatter)

nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10E to forge (E2)

This is a special magic hammer that is used to smash objects into small pieces. It has now been modified for purposes of war and can be used to inflict great damage on inanimate beings. It is a great weapon against mechanical constructs and certain undead beings.
